What is Feynman's estranged sister's name?
What scientific discipline did Feynman discourage his sister from studying?
Who was the one that pushed Richard to explore the universe?

context: When Richard was five years old, his mother gave birth to a younger brother, but this brother <a0_0><b5_0>died at four weeks of age<b5_0/><a0_0/>. Four years later, Richard gained a sister, <b6_0><b8_0>Joan<b8_0/><b6_0/>, and the family moved to Far Rockaway, Queens. Though separated by nine years, <a1_0>Joan<a1_0/> and Richard were close, as they both shared a natural curiosity about the world. Their mother thought that women did not have the cranial capacity to comprehend such things. Despite their mother's disapproval of Joan's desire to study <a2_0><b7_0>astronomy<b7_0/><a2_0/>, <a3_0>Richard<a3_0/> encouraged his sister to explore the universe. Joan eventually became an <a4_0><b9_0>astrophysicist<b9_0/><a4_0/> specializing in interactions between the Earth and the solar wind.
